Title: The 2010 World Expo in Shanghai China -- "Educational Wall Charts Entering Primary and Secondary Schools across the Country" Theme Activity
Designer: PRC Education Ministry (中华人民共和国教育部)Xinhua tongxun she (新华通讯社)
Notes: The poster, titled "The new stage of human civilization" (人类文明的新驿站), shows photographs of the opening ceremony of the Shanghai Expo 2010 on 30 April 2010. There is a photograph of Hu Jintao. The mascot, Haibao ("jewel of the sea", 海宝), makes his appearance.The poster was sponsored by the National Grid (国家电网).
Tags: 中国2010年上海世界博览会
